Comment.val: /*This function checks whether the persistent data is up to referencedate. - (re-)Calculates the portfoliovalues when neccessary - returns the sum of the values of all instrument-positions not excluded by deduction-limits. */

Text.val: Use CalculationStorage when exists or built up storage when average or assetDistribution is requested).

ExpSyntax.val: IF({0,603979781},'INNER JOIN '&DbName('{7,11}'DSOURCE)&' on be_volgnummer = b.instrument_id and be_tsa_ind=1','')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select sum(report_value), sum(system_value) from ( select avg(b.value)*count(*)/~5 report_value, avg(b.value*q.quote)*count(*)/~5 system_value, b.instrument_id from pc_portfolio_base b INNER JOIN pERFORMANCE_REPORT R ON R.ID = B.PERE_ID inner join pc_quote_per_day_vw q on q.be_id = ~4 and quote_date = b.calc_date :6 where r.ppr_id = ~1 and b.calc_date between to_date(~2, 'DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date(~3, 'DD-MM-YYYY') group by b.instrument_id)

select asset_categorie, sum(gperc*sub_reportvalue/100) report_value, sum(gperc*sub_systemvalue/100) system_value from ( select avg(b.value)*count(*)/~5 sub_reportvalue, avg(b.value*q.quote)*count(*)/~5 sub_systemvalue, decode(nvl(k2.vbp_rubriek_nr,0),0,k1.vbp_rubriek_nr, k2.vbp_rubriek_nr) asset_categorie, decode(nvl(k2.vbp_percentage,0), 0, 100, k2.vbp_percentage) gperc from PC_PORTFOLIO_BASE B inner join performance_report r on r.id = b.pere_id inner join beleggingsinstrument bi on bi.be_volgnummer = b.instrument_id inner join pc_quote_per_day_vw q on q.be_id = ~6 and quote_date = b.calc_date left outer join vb_verm_rubriek_koppeling k1 on k1.vbp_bi_type = bi.be_bi_nummer and k1.vbp_groep_nr = ~4 left outer join vb_verm_rubriek_koppeling k2 on k2.vbp_fondssymbool = bi.be_symbool and k2.vbp_optietype = bi.be_optietype and k2.vbp_expiratiedatum = bi.be_expiratiedatum and k2.vbp_exerciseprijs = bi.be_exerciseprijs and k2.vbp_groep_nr = ~4 where r.ppr_id = ~1 and b.calc_date between to_date(~2, 'DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date(~3, 'DD-MM-YYYY') group by b.instrument_id, decode(nvl(k2.vbp_rubriek_nr,0),0,k1.vbp_rubriek_nr, k2.vbp_rubriek_nr), decode(nvl(k2.vbp_percentage,0), 0, 100, k2.vbp_percentage) ) group by asset_categorie

Text.val: Onderstaande gaat nooit af (zie conditie aanroep taak). Nog niet gemplementeerd maar staat wel in de XSD.

SQL_STMT_U.val: select instrument_id, avg(b.value)*count(*)/~5 sub_reportvalue, avg(b.value*q.quote)*count(*)/~5 sub_systemvalue, decode(nvl(k2.vbp_rubriek_nr,0),0,k1.vbp_rubriek_nr, k2.vbp_rubriek_nr) asset_categorie from PC_PORTFOLIO_BASE B inner join performance_report r on r.id = b.pere_id inner join beleggingsinstrument bi on bi.be_volgnummer = b.instrument_id inner join pc_quote_per_day_vw q on q.be_id = ~7 and quote_date = b.calc_date left outer join vb_verm_rubriek_koppeling k1 on k1.vbp_bi_type = bi.be_bi_nummer and k1.vbp_groep_nr = ~4 and k1.vbp_rubriek_nr = ~6 left outer join vb_verm_rubriek_koppeling k2 on k2.vbp_fondssymbool = bi.be_symbool and k2.vbp_optietype = bi.be_optietype and k2.vbp_expiratiedatum = bi.be_expiratiedatum and k2.vbp_exerciseprijs = bi.be_exerciseprijs and k2.vbp_groep_nr = ~4 and k2.vbp_rubriek_nr = ~6 where r.ppr_id = ~1 and b.calc_date between to_date(~2, 'DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date(~3, 'DD-MM-YYYY') group by b.instrument_id, decode(nvl(k2.vbp_rubriek_nr,0),0,k1.vbp_rubriek_nr, k2.vbp_rubriek_nr), decode(nvl(k2.vbp_percentage,0), 0, 100, k2.vbp_percentage)

select asset_category, sum(sub_reportvalue*gperc/100) total_reportvalue, sum(sub_systemvalue*gperc/100) total_systemvalue from ( select avg(b.value)*count(*)/~5 sub_reportvalue, avg(b.value*q.quote)*count(*)/~5 sub_systemvalue, m.inas_sac_Id asset_category, m.inas_percentage gperc from pc_portfolio_base b INNER JOIN pERFORMANCE_REPORT R ON R.ID = B.PERE_ID inner join instrument_assetmix m on m.inas_be_id = b.instrument_id inner join pc_quote_per_day_vw q on q.be_id = ~4 and quote_date = b.calc_date where r.ppr_id = ~1 and b.calc_date between to_date(~2, 'DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date(~3, 'DD-MM-YYYY') group by instrument_id, m.inas_sac_Id, m.inas_percentage ) group by asset_category

Text.val: Voorlopig is specifcatie van instrumenten niet mogelijk. Om de kinderen te schrijven is een qroup suffix nodig maar dan krijgen
we een foutmelding bij de 2e categorie. ErrorXML Update, Record deleted in another view,
Onderstaande gaat nooit af (zie conditie aanroep taak). Nog niet gemplementeerd maar staat wel in de XSD.

SQL_STMT_U.val: select instrument_id, avg(b.value)*count(*)/~5*m.inas_percentage/100 sub_reportvalue, avg(b.value*q.quote)*count(*)/~5*m.inas_percentage/100 sub_systemvalue from pc_portfolio_base b INNER JOIN pERFORMANCE_REPORT R ON R.ID = B.PERE_ID inner join instrument_assetmix m on m.inas_be_id = b.instrument_id inner join pc_quote_per_day_vw q on q.be_id = ~4 and quote_date = b.calc_date where r.ppr_id = ~1 and b.calc_date between to_date(~2, 'DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date(~3, 'DD-MM-YYYY') and m.inas_sac_id = ~6 group by instrument_id, m.inas_sac_Id, m.inas_percentage

select avg(b.value)*count(*)/~5 report_value, avg(b.value*q.quote)*count(*)/~5 system_value, b.account_id, ac.re_muntsoort from pc_account_base b inner join performance_report r ON R.ID = B.PERE_ID inner join rekeningen ac on ac.re_id = b.account_id inner join pc_quote_per_day_vw q on q.be_id = ~4 and quote_date = b.calc_date where r.ppr_id = ~1 and b.calc_date between to_date(~2, 'DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date(~3, 'DD-MM-YYYY') group by b.account_id, ac.re_muntsoort

select b.instrument_id, avg(b.value)*count(*)/~5 reportvalue, avg(b.value*q.quote)*count(*)/~5 systemvalue from pc_portfolio_base b INNER JOIN pERFORMANCE_REPORT R ON R.ID = B.PERE_ID inner join pc_quote_per_day_vw q on q.be_id = ~4 and quote_date = b.calc_date where r.ppr_id = ~1 and b.calc_date between to_date(~2, 'DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date(~3, 'DD-MM-YYYY') group by instrument_id
